ygData.messageBody:
--- Chad Butler <butler@...> wrote:
>> I think many would appreciate it, and that it would
>> benefit us all, if the smiths on the list could work
>> together (through posting) to assmble a listing by
>> zone location what items and/or equipment are
>> available there as relating to smithing.

> Move to freeport.

Ok, this isn't what I would really call a useful comment. Care you to
expand on the availability of smithing and smithing supplies in
Freeport, that we might have the knowledge available to the list?

Druther (9th Paladin, Tarrew Marr) Tailor and Smith
